Configuration.Name: ArchivesSpace Interface
Configuration.Author: Atlas Systems, Inc.
Configuration.Description: This addon performs searches in ArchivesSpace using the staff interface. This addon supports ArchivesSpace versions v2.0.0 and later.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: ArchivesSpaceStaffURL
Setting.Description: The URL of the ArchivesSpace Frontend Staff UI. An example would be http://127.0.0.1:8080/

Setting.name: ArchivesSpaceBackendURL
Setting.Description: The URL of the ArchviesSpace Backend API service. An example would be http://127.0.0.1:8089/

Setting.name: AS_Username
Setting.Description: The staff username to use when logging in to the web interface. It is recommended to use an account that has read-only permissions on the relevant repositories.

Setting.name: AS_Password
Setting.Description: The staff password to use when logging in to the web interface. It is recommended to use an account that has read-only permissions on the relevant repositories.

Setting.name: AutoSearchPriority
Setting.Description: A comma-separated list of searches to be performed in order.
